steps.description: Add a 'forget' subcommand to the 'memory' command in cmd/smolcode/main.go. This subcommand will take one argument, the ID of the memory to forget, and call the existing mgr.Forget(memID) function.
acceptance: A new `forget` case is added to the switch statement in `handleMemoryCommand`.
The `forget` case parses one command-line argument for the memory ID.
Success and error messages are printed to the console.
